ygData.subject: Re: Ashenbone Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Correct.  In order for us to acquire other more important traits in early beta, bards gave up two handed slashing.  All the bards made a big stink about it
ygData.messageBody:
> lvl bard can now use a 2 hand slashing weapon? did I remember it right that
> Bard 2hand slashing skill cannot be trained though?

Correct. In order for us to acquire other more important traits
in early beta, bards gave up two handed slashing. All the bards
made a big stink about it too. Personally, I'd rather wear plate
and dual wield. Just as the instrument pieces are still left over
from an attempt to get bards to fuse their own instruments, so is
the Two-Handed Slashing box at training in the Guild. It's merely
an icon of the past, so to speak. You cannot train or raise skill
in it. We are forever stuck at ground zero.

(I would use the axe for looks tho, 2hs is kinda freaky on a bard)

You would definitely stand out of the BRD crowd. As for melee
effectiveness, we dont have double attack (nor need it) so you
would feel the strain of a 44 delay weapon at the lowest skill
possible.

Harmonic Distortion, 46th (goodbye hell levels) unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
<Lords of Aesir> Innoruuk
